thread.section_title: Poseidon Expeditions Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Poseidon Expeditions | poseidonexpeditions.com | 2 of 5
thread.title: Susan Hunter Blake
thread.title_full: Poseidon Expeditions reviewed by Susan Hunter Blake

author: Susan Hunter Blake
title: Susan Hunter Blake
text: This trip was beyond incredible !!! The process and communication from booking to the end of the trip were effortless. Staff bent over backwards to meet the requests and preferences of all guests on board. I knew Antarctica would be amazing, but the staff of Poseidon made it perfect !!!
